markdownRemark.html: Costa Water Parks is a local company which has inflatable and floating water parks at different locations along the coast. Also located in Puerto Banus, Mijas Costa, Fuengirola and Benalmádena (in front of Bil-Bil Castle)

frontmatter.title: Water Parks in the Sea (Sotogrande)
